Articles.Content: Okay, so, I was thinking that the Kerbal motions get a little repetitive after a while, so, I was wondering if it would be possible to build a mod which adds additional animations to the character models? Or, if that's not possible, if it might be possible to have such animations as part of an IVA, such as a Kerbal pushing buttons, or looking at another Kerbal and giving a thumbs up. How difficult would such a thing be?
Neither are currently possible. We don't have access to Kerbal animation.
I know I saw something somewhere recently about a mod like this in development. Maybe it was reddit...
